snippet: The dissident artist Ai Weiwei has thrown down another bold challenge to the Chinese authorities with a new essay that assails Beijing over its suppression of dissent and censorship of the Internet. He writes, "The government computer has one button:...
abstract: The dissident artist Ai Weiwei has thrown down another bold challenge to the Chinese authorities with a new essay that assails Beijing over its suppression of dissent and censorship of the Internet. He writes, "The government computer has one button: delete."

headline.main: Ai Weiwei on the Pen and the Gun
